allowClear.description: Allow the user to clear the selected value, sets the value to null.

autoClearSearchValue.description: Whether the current search will be cleared on selecting an item.

autoFocus.description: Autofocus to the block on page load.

bordered.description: Whether or not the selector has a border style.

clearIcon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block to customize icon at far right position of the selector, shown when user is given option to clear input.

inputStyle.description: Css style to applied to input.

optionsStyle.description: Css style to applied to option elements.

align.description: Align label left or right when inline.

extra.description: Extra text to display beneath the content - supports html.

hasFeedback.description: Display feedback extra from validation, this does not disable validation.

extraStyle.description: Css style to applied to label extra.

feedbackStyle.description: Css style to applied to label feedback.

oneOf.description: Options can either be an array of primitive values, on an array of label, value pairs - supports html.
Options can either be an array of primitive values, on an array of label, value pairs.
Options can either be an array of primitive values, on an array of label, value pairs.
Options can either be an array of primitive values, on an array of label, value pairs.

label.description: Value label shown to user - supports html.

value.description: Value selected. Can be of any type.

filterString.description: String to match against when filtering selector options during. If no filterString is provided the filter method matches against options.label.

style.description: Css style to applied to option.

color.description: Color of the Tag. Preset options are success, processing, error, warning, default, blue, cyan, geekblue, gold, green, lime, magenta, orange, purple, red, volcano, or alternatively any hex color.

title.description: Content title of tag - supports html.

icon.description: Name of an Ant Design Icon or properties of an Icon block to customize alert icon.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the block before user selects input.

loadingPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text to show in options while the block is loading.

notFoundContent.description: Placeholder text to show when list of options are empty.

selectedIcon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block to customize icon showing when a selection is made in the drop-down list.

showArrow.description: Show the suffix icon at the drop-down position of the selector.

suffixIcon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block to customize at the drop-down position of the selector.

title.description: Multiple selector label title - supports html.

renderTags.description: When true, the selected option labels are rendered as tags in the selector input. This field must be true to render option tag values.

onChange.description: Trigger actions when selection is changed.

onBlur.description: Trigger action event occurs when selector loses focus.

onFocus.description: Trigger action when selector gets focus.

onClear.description: Trigger action when selector gets cleared.

onSearch.description: Trigger actions when input is changed. 'value' is passed to the _event operator to be used in actions such as search queries.
